LanguageData.SadjuukWoodFence.label: Wood Fence
LanguageData.SadjuukGridFence.label: Grid Fence
LanguageData.SadjuukGridFence.description: HP : 250 An industrial metal grid fence.
LanguageData.SadjuukGlassFenceA.label: Glass Partition
LanguageData.SadjuukGlassFenceA.description: HP : 70 As safe as aesthetically pleasing, glass partitions are an easy way to transform your space.
LanguageData.SadjuukConcreteFence.label: Concrete Fence
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodenPallet.label: Wooden Pallet
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodenPallet.description: A Wooden Pallet, easy to build and allowing a standardized storage.
LanguageData.SadjuukPowerConduit.label: Power Conduit
LanguageData.SadjuukFirefoamPopper.label: Wall firefoam popper
LanguageData.SadjuukFirefoamPopper.description: Safety device poping and spraying a fire-retardant foam around itself.
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodGeneratorA.label: Wood Generator
LanguageData.SadjuukWoodGeneratorA.description: P : 1500W A very rustic generator, using water steam as source of power.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorD.label: Fuel Oil Generator D
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorD.description: P : 2250W A rustic and simple fuel oil generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorA.label: Fuel Oil Generator A
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorA.description: P : 12000W A rustic version of the standard UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Good production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 15% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorB.label: Fuel Oil Generator B
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorB.description: P : 12000W The industrial version of the UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Double injection system, double filtration system, High production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 20% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorF.label: Armored Generator F
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorF.description: P : 2250W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 35% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorG.label: Armored Generator G
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorG.description: P : 6000W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorN.label: Armored Generator N
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorN.description: P : 3000W Military 3kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorM.label: Armored Generator M
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorM.description: P : 6000W Military 6kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorY.label: Large Fuel Cell
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorY.description: P : 3200W Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorV.label: Portable Generator V
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorV.description: P : 750W A Diesel portable generator. Low capacity tank, low power but sufficient for most nomadic situations. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorW.label: Portable Generator W
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorW.description: P : 750W A military Diesel generator. UNSC standard, low capacity but portable, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorX.label: Portable Fuel Cell X
LanguageData.SadjuukGeneratorX.description: P : 800W A Portable Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarA.label: Solar Panel A
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarA.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 4X4.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarB.label: Solar Panel B
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarB.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 5X3.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarC.label: Solar Panel C
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarC.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 7X2.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingBench.label: Metalworking Bench
LanguageData.SadjuukBessemerConverter.label: Bessemer Converter
LanguageData.SadjuukBessemerConverter.description: First inexpensive industrial process for the mass production of steel. Obsolete since the development of the open hearth furnace.
LanguageData.SadjuukOpenHearthFurnace.label: Open Hearth Furnace
LanguageData.SadjuukOpenHearthFurnace.description: Furnace where excess carbon and other impurities are burnt out of pig iron to produce steel.
LanguageData.SadjuukElectricArcFurnace.label: Electric Arc Furnace
LanguageData.SadjuukElectricArcFurnace.description: Furnace that heats charged material by means of an electric arc. Very high production rate.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingLineB.label: Metalworking Line
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalworkingLineB.description: The Metalworking Line is a very versatile production line to work the metal.
LanguageData.SadjuukShaper.label: Shaper Tool
LanguageData.SadjuukShaper.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A Shaper tool. Its most common use is to machine straight flat surfaces, but with ingenuity and some accessories a wide range of work can be done. Production Factor : 0.20, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukGrinding.label: Grinding Machine
LanguageData.SadjuukGrinding.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A Grinding Machine used to finish workpieces that must show high surface quality and high accuracy of shape and dimension. Production Factor : 0.40, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukWeldingRobot.label: Welding Robot
LanguageData.SadjuukWeldingRobot.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A mechanized programmable tool, completely automating a welding process by both performing the weld and handling the part. Production Factor : 0.80, 2 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyLineB.label: Assembly Line
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyLineB.description: The Assembly Line is a production line allowing to assemble a wide variety of components.
LanguageData.SadjuukLathe.label: Metal Lathe
LanguageData.SadjuukLathe.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. Machine tool removing material from a rotating workpiece via the movements of various cutting tools. Production Factor : 0.20, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukMilling.label: Milling Machine
LanguageData.SadjuukMilling.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. A Milling Machine that removes material from a workpiece by advancing the cutter into the workpiece. Production Factor : 0.40, 1 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyRobot.label: Assembly Robot
LanguageData.SadjuukAssemblyRobot.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. A multi-role robot capable of assembling, picking, and packing with a high endurance, speed, and precision. Production Factor : 0.80, 2 per line max.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionMachinery.label: Construction Machinery
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionMachinery.description: A very complex machinery capable of extracting silicon from the rock and coarsely refining organic elements to produce glass, concrete and asphalt.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA.label: Fuel Oil Refinery
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryA.description: Medium capacity Fuel Oil Refinery. Good efficiency, far from conventional industrial capabilities but known as reliable and versatile. The Fuel Oil has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 20% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryB.label: Diesel Refinery
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryB.description: Medium capacity Diesel Refinery. The Diesel has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 50% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryC.label: Advanced Refinery
LanguageData.SadjuukRefineryC.description: Advanced Refinery allowing the production of complex components like explosives or liquid hydrogen. The Liquid Hydrogen has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 80% more efficient generators.
LanguageData.SadjuukConcrete.label: Concrete
LanguageData.SadjuukConcrete.description: A composite material, fine and coarse aggregate bonded together. Concrete makes a building fire-safe due to its noncombustible nature.
LanguageData.SadjuukAsphaltConcrete.label: Asphalt Concrete
LanguageData.SadjuukAsphaltConcrete.description: Asphalt mixed with aggregate particles to create Asphalt Concrete.
LanguageData.SadjuukGlass.label: Glass
LanguageData.SadjuukSyntheticPaint.label: Synthetic Paint
LanguageData.SadjuukSyntheticPaint.description: An extremely tough and durable single-component synthetic resin based paint for interior use on highly trafficked floors. Fast drying, excellent covering properties.
LanguageData.SadjuukSteelPlate.label: Steel Plate
LanguageData.SadjuukSteelPlate.description: A basic structural component used in a wide variety of construction.
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalGrid.label: Metal Grid
LanguageData.SadjuukMetalGrid.description: A variety of sturdy pieces of interwoven steel.
LanguageData.SadjuukSteelTube.label: Steel Tube
LanguageData.SadjuukSteelTube.description: A variety of sturdy hollow cylinder.
LanguageData.SadjuukWire.label: Wire
LanguageData.SadjuukArmoredPlate.label: Armored Plate
LanguageData.SadjuukArmoredPlate.description: A very high-density structural component used in a wide variety of advanced construction.
LanguageData.SadjuukBasicComponent.label: Basic Components
LanguageData.SadjuukBasicComponent.description: A collection of industrial components as electric motors, sensors, pneumatic actuators, fasteners and others.
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarCell.label: Solar Cell
LanguageData.SadjuukSolarCell.description: Photovoltaic component used in the construction of Solar Panels.
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOil.label: Fuel oil
LanguageData.SadjuukFuelOil.description: Low sulfur heavy fuel oil. Also known as marine fuel, it is used on rustic installations. Not explosive, it can only be ignited.
LanguageData.SadjuukDiesel.label: Diesel
LanguageData.SadjuukDiesel.description: Fractional distillate of fuel oil. Very efficient fuel for generators, with an excellent energy-volume ratio.
LanguageData.SadjuukHydrogen.label: Liquid Hydrogen
LanguageData.SadjuukHydrogen.description: Liquid hydrogen is a common liquid rocket fuel but can also be used as fuel for fuel cell.
